Text.Page:
It's unlikely there are any other survivors, but please keep an eye out while you're in the mines.

I can't go back. I just...I can't. But I'd never forgive myself if no one even looked for signs of life.

My poor brother. He was so young.... It should have been me.
(A pendant hangs from the neck of this mangled corpse. "Pattek" is inscribed on the back. You put it in your pocket.)

They're all dead? It's just as I feared.

They were alive only a few hours ago....

Oh, this pendant. I know this pendant. It belonged to Pattek.

Here, I'll...I'll see to it personally that his family gets it.
